attributes.action: Allow people to know the price of phone calls over 25p per minute.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recent problems with premium rate phone scams and other such expensive scams with reguards phone users I propose a new rule. I propose that at the start of all calls over the price of 25p, a voice should tell you at the begining of the call "this call with cost X pence per minute". Then if you don't want to continue, you can put the phone down.
